originalText.text: Dr.  Sassoon is the best...delivered my 3 of my 4 children and has continued to provide excellent, proactive, thoughtful OB/GYN care to me into my 60's!  He is not only incredibly skilled and experienced but also personable and approachable. Everyone at the practice is friendly and welcoming- could not recommend more highly!

text.text: Dr.  Sassoon is the best...delivered my 3 of my 4 children and has continued to provide excellent, proactive, thoughtful OB/GYN care to me into my 60's!  He is not only incredibly skilled and experienced but also personable and approachable. Everyone at the practice is friendly and welcoming- could not recommend more highly!

originalText.text:
I have been a patient of Dr. Sassoon for many years and would never consider consulting with another physician. His expertise and professionalism are equally matched by his compassion.  Dr. Sassoon and his staff are always welcoming and make every effort to ensure the patient is respected and at ease during the visit. This is an experience rarely matched by others in today's medical world.
He is truly one of the best.
Kathy Liosis

originalText.text: Dr. Sassoon was my OB through my pregnancy and delivery (Cesarean)- he is the kindest and most informative doctor I have ever been to. Neither me or my husband are from the NYC area and were referred to Dr. Sassoon - the referrer said he was the best doctor they had ever had and it is true. I wish every woman could have the level of care I received. If you are bristling at having to pay out of pocket- it is worth it for what you save on stress and time! Appointments were a breeze, both at his office and offices he would send you to for scans. He and his staff ensured we were "ushered" through the pregnancy and delivery. . He is highly regarded at Lenox Hill and ensures you receive the best treatment while in the hospital. Even with medical complications popping up in my 3rd trimester, the pregnancy and delivery felt like a breeze with Dr. Sassoon and his team by my side

originalText.text: Dr.  Sassoon is a truly great physician!  He listens to his patients carefully, takes the time to thoroughly answer questions or concerns, is conservative in his treatment, is thoughtful, empathetic and cares about his patients.  I could not have more confidence in Dr. Sassoon and most highly recommend him.
